author: TigreCapital
content: Every time I go into a Nike store I think they can't possibly raise their prices any higher and every year I'm wrong

author: TigreCapital
content: @FritzValue @HFM17Mile TJMaxx, Outlets, other places that are a lot cheaper. But for the upper-middle class it's all Nike and Lulu for women

author: TigreCapital
content: @HFM17Mile I love the stock and still own it, so I think they have pricing power but it has gotten pretty fashion-y which concerns me

author: TigreCapital
content: @FritzValue @HFM17Mile pretty much nailed it I think, it's more about fashion statement and social proof than clothes.

author: TigreCapital
content: @FritzValue @HFM17Mile I don't know about LULU, I don't know if it's a fad, could be, but seems too saturated at this point

author: TigreCapital
content: @HFM17Mile @FritzValue depends on if you think they are sports apparel companies or fashion companies now I think

content: First break. Nothing exciting. Started with 300k. I have about 308k.  Table seems fine. People are quiet.
